title: Crater Lake National Park: Aquatic Moss in Crater Lake
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Science & Research     Aquatic Moss in Crater Lake              The story of the thousand year old moss of Crater Lake       The aquatic moss of Crater Lake               Aquatic Moss Studies at Crater Lake   Loading the player...       Visit JWPlayer docs for keyboard shortcuts  Duration:3 minutes, 7 seconds  Since this video was created in 2007 we have learned that the amazing moss community began growing in the lake several thousand years ago.               Aquatic Moss Around Wizard Island   Loading the player...       Visit JWPlayer docs for keyboard shortcuts  Duration:1 minute, 6 seconds  This U.S. Geological Survey computer animation shows the location of moss (green and yellow) around Wizard Island.  The red dots are locations where moss samples were collected.
